thread.title: Girl, 5, seriously injured in hit-and-run west valley crash
thread.title_full: Girl, 5, seriously injured in hit-and-run west valley crash

title: Girl, 5, seriously injured in hit-and-run west valley crash
text:
Published By: Las Vegas RJ - Today 
Las Vegas police are looking for a hit-and-run driver who seriously hurt a 5-year-old girl Friday afternoon in the west valley....
